mapper.sql: activity_id, user_id, community_id, topic_ids, like_num, collect_num, comment_num, created_at, updated_at, is_deleted
mapper.insert: insert into minivideo.activities (user_id, community_id, topic_ids, like_num, collect_num, comment_num, created_at, updated_at, is_deleted, content) values (#{userId}, #{communityId}, #{topicIds}, #{likeNum}, #{collectNum}, #{commentNum}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{isDeleted}, #{content})

insert into minivideo.activities
user_id,
community_id,
topic_ids,
like_num,
collect_num,
comment_num,
created_at,
updated_at,
is_deleted,
content,
#{userId},
#{communityId},
#{topicIds},
#{likeNum},
#{collectNum},
#{commentNum},
#{createdAt},
#{updatedAt},
#{isDeleted},
#{content},
mapper.update:
update minivideo.activities
user_id = #{userId},
community_id = #{communityId},
topic_ids = #{topicIds},
like_num = #{likeNum},
collect_num = #{collectNum},
comment_num = #{commentNum},
created_at = #{createdAt},
updated_at = #{updatedAt},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
content = #{content},
where activity_id = #{activityId}

update minivideo.activities set user_id = #{userId}, community_id = #{communityId}, topic_ids = #{topicIds}, like_num = #{likeNum}, collect_num = #{collectNum}, comment_num = #{commentNum}, created_at = #{createdAt}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted}, content = #{content} where activity_id = #{activityId}

update minivideo.activities set user_id = #{userId}, community_id = #{communityId}, topic_ids = #{topicIds}, like_num = #{likeNum}, collect_num = #{collectNum}, comment_num = #{commentNum}, created_at = #{createdAt}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted} where activity_id = #{activityId}
mapper.select: select , from minivideo.activities where activity_id=#{activityId} and is_deleted=0
select , from minivideo.activities where activity_id=#{activityId} and is_deleted=0 for update
mapper.update: update minivideo.activities set like_num=like_num+1 where activity_id=#{activityId} and is_deleted=0
update minivideo.activities set collect_num=collect_num+1 where activity_id=#{activityId} and is_deleted=0
update minivideo.activities set comment_num=comment_num+1 where activity_id=#{activityId} and is_deleted=0
mapper.select: select , from minivideo.activities where community_id=#{communityId} and is_deleted=0 order by created_at desc
select , from minivideo.activities where community_id=#{communityId} and is_deleted=0 order by like_num desc
select , from minivideo.activities where is_deleted=0 order by created_at desc
select user_id from minivideo.activities where activity_id=#{activityId} and is_deleted=0
